data.name: 实时生产进度上报
data.schemaJson: {"fields":[{"key":"processCategory","label":"实时生产类目/工序","type":"select","required":true,"options_source":"product_catalog"},{"key":"reportDate","label":"上报产品日期/批次","type":"date","required":true},{"key":"carrierSerialNo","label":"周转载具生产序列号","type":"integer","required":true},{"key":"quantity","label":"产品数量","type":"integer","required":true},{"key":"photos","label":"照片","type":"photo_array","required":true,"max":10},{"key":"notes","label":"备注","type":"text","required":false}]}
